articles.description: Aridane Santana (58') put Hyderabad ahead but Goa left it late and scored through substitute Ishan Pandita (87') and Igor Angulo (90') to inflict a third successive defeat on the Nizams.
articles.content:
FC Goa picked up three points in style as they staged a thrilling comeback to see off Hyderabad FC 2-1 at the Tilak Maidan Stadium here on Wednesday.

articles.description: Get a report of the Atletico Madrid vs. Getafe 2020-2021 LaLiga football match.
articles.content:
